title: Brewers rally again to win record 14th straight
content: Andruw Monasterio hit a three-run home run in the 11th inning and the Milwaukee Brewers won their franchise-record 14th game.

title: Phillies ace Wheeler on 15-day IL with blood clot
content: Philadelphia Phillies ace Zack Wheeler was placed on the 15-day injured list with a blood clot near his right shoulder.

title: Chargers WR Johnston carted off after big hit
content: Chargers WR Quentin Johnston exited Saturday's preseason game on a cart after taking a big hit that left him motionless for several minutes.

title: 'I've arrived': Jeanty makes powerful statement
content: Rookie RB Ashton Jeanty had his "I'm here" moment against the 49ers on Saturday, delivering some big plays -- and big hits -- in the Raiders' second preseason game.

title: Sources: Big Ten ponders jump to 24 or 28 in CFP
content: While the idea is in the very early stages, the Big Ten's proposal for a 24- or 28-team College Football Playoff eliminates conference title games and offers a large number of auto bids for all four power leagues.

title: Steichen 'very close' to decision in Colts' QB race
content: Colts coach Shane Steichen said he'd like to have a decision soon after quarterbacks Anthony Richardson Sr. and Daniel Jones each took snaps in Saturday's preseason loss to the Packers.

title: Messi golazo, stunning assist give Miami late win
content: Lionel Messi scored a brilliant individual strike and then provided a sensational assist for Luis Su√°rez to propel Inter Miami to a 3-1 win over LA Galaxy.

title: McLean's debut gem gives Mets 'missing' energy
content: Rookie Nolan McLean delivered what the Mets needed in his MLB debut, striking out eight and flashing some clutch leather over 5‚Öì scoreless innings in a 3-1 win over the Mariners.

title: Ultimate Draft Board: Perfect picks for every round in a 12-team league
content: Mike Clay provides his blueprint for 2025 fantasy football drafts, including ideal selections in each round and overall strategy.

title: Tory Horton, Jaxson Dart, Adonai Mitchell among deep sleepers for 2025
content: These sleepers are truly for those in deeper leagues seeking off-the-radar types who may emerge in 2025.

title: Why Bryce Young, C.J. Stroud's childhood bond will 'never waver'
content: Their friendship dates back to AAU hoops and a high school football game to settle the best team in California.

title: Stacking the best, worst positional groups in the NFL: 1-32 rankings, plus roster outlooks
content: Which team has the best wide receivers? The shakiest edge rusher room? We ranked all 32 teams in 10 position groups.

title: Inside the strategy of organizing an NFL locker room
content: NFL coaches are always looking for an edge, and some believe that can be found in the locker room seating chart.

title: Bowl projections: Every matchup from the Celebration Bowl to the national title game
content: It's August and no games have been played, but we're breaking down who will be where in December and beyond.

title: Juan Soto's shuffle bat among best from MLB Players' Weekend
content: Players' Weekend allows player to don and use custom gear reflecting three themes: off-field interests, causes and appreciation.

title: Little League, big dreams: Mets, Mariners players as Little Leaguers
content: From Cal Raleigh to Juan Soto, here's what players in this year's Little League Classic looked like as Little Leaguers themselves.

title: The Hockey Diversity Alliance turns 5: Challenges, triumphs, what's next
content: What started as a group chat in 2020 has become a force for change in expanding hockey to underserved communities.

title: Dive into the ESPN/KFF Survey of 1988 NFL Players
content: Read the key takeaways and methodology of the ESPN/KFF Survey of 1988 NFL Players, and see additional stories and videos from the project.

title: üéµ Taylor Swift joins Kelce brothers on 'New Heights'
content: The superstar debuted on Jason and Travis Kelce's "New Heights" podcast, talked about becoming a football fan -- and even caught Caitlin Clark's attention.

title: üìà NFL Future Power Rankings
content: We ranked all 32 NFL franchises' expectations for 2025 through 2027. Which teams are set up to thrive in the future?

title: üèà Predicting best, worst scenarios for NFL teams
content: We simulated best-case and worst-case scenarios for every team, and our NFL reporters picked the biggest variables.

title: üèÄ Is there any coming back for banned Knicks fans?
content: Despite backlash, MSG Entertainment's "attorney exclusion list" is still in effect, reportedly banning over a thousand lawyers since 2022.

title: Is Flagg a ROY lock? How 11 rookies can challenge the No. 1 pick
content: NBA analyst Kevin Pelton groups 11 players most likely to threaten the Mavericks' No. 1 pick for the auspicious award.

title: A White House nod boosts the stature of once-shunned MMA
content: Dana White recounts sport's long journey from 'human cockfighting' obscurity to a presidential embrace

title: Transfer rumors, news: Eze keen on Spurs move, amid Arsenal links
content: Manchester City are pondering a move for Paris Saint-Germain goalkeeper Gianluigi Donnarumma if Ederson decides to leave. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Flash floods in Himachal: Mandi, Kullu, Kinnaur worst hit; highway blocked
content: Flash floods in Himachal Pradesh's Mandi district have severely disrupted connectivity, particularly along the Chandigarh-Manali National Highway. Heavy rainfall across the state has resulted in numerous road closures, power outages, and water supply disruptions, with Mandi, Kullu, and Kinnaur being the most affected.

title: Ukraine to lose Donbas? Trump plans Putin-Zelenskyy talks before Aug 22
content: Donald Trump is reportedly planning a trilateral meeting with Vladimir Putin and Volodymyr Zelenskyy in Washington before April 22nd. This comes amid claims Trump suggested Ukraine cede control of the Donbas region for a ceasefire, aligning with Putin's demands. While Zelenskyy rejects territorial concessions, he's open to summit discussions, seeking security guarantees and an end to the conflict.

title: ‚ÄòAsk ChatGPT‚Äô: Parameshwara says he‚Äôs India‚Äôs no.1 HM after ‚ÄòI don‚Äôt know‚Äô row
content: Karnataka's Home Minister G Parameshwara is facing online trolling for his frequent use of "I don't know" in response to questions. He has now retorted by citing ChatGPT, claiming it ranks him as India's top home minister. Parameshwara defended his approach, stating he avoids speculation without complete information and urged media to report mistakes internally before publicizing them.

title: Padma Shri awardee Bula Choudhury robbed: 150 medals, mementos stolen
content: Former Indian swimmer Bula Choudhury, also known as the 'Queen of Seas,' suffered a devastating loss as thieves broke into her Hindmotor house and stole over 150 medals and mementos, including her Padma Shri brooch and 10 SAF Games gold medals. This marks the third theft at her residence, with previous incidents in 2014 involving stolen jewelry and electronics.

title: Cricket | 'Saare jo musalman hai...' - Irfan Pathan exposes Pakistan‚Äôs hypocrisy
content: Irfan Pathan has criticized Pakistan for presuming to be the protectors of Muslims globally, urging them to address their own issues first. He also spoke about his rivalry with Shahid Afridi, recalling personal insults and on-field battles.

title: ‚Äò82% stake sold‚Äô: Tesla exec offloads shares; Musk renews short seller threat
content: Tesla's Tom Zhu has sold over 82% of his Tesla shares since 2023. The sales occurred between 2023 and 2024. Elon Musk warned short sellers of potential losses if Tesla achieves full autonomy. Musk has clashed with Bill Gates over Gates' alleged short position against Tesla. This position reportedly cost Gates $1.5 billion.

title: ‚ÄòUS job‚Äô trap in Hyderabad: Women lured, drugged, raped at ‚Äòoffice‚Äô parties
content: Telangana police uncovered a disturbing racket where young women were lured with promises of US jobs, then drugged, sexually exploited, and financially drained. Posing as an IT company, the accused targeted women with basic qualifications, offering fake training and high salaries. Victims were given date rape drugs at parties, leaving them vulnerable and unaware of the extent of their exploitation.

title: Rahul's 'Vote Adhikar Yatra' in Bihar starts today
content: Rahul Gandhi is set to launch the 'Vote Adhikar Yatra' from Sasaram, Bihar, to protest the alleged disenfranchisement of voters through the state's special intensive revision of electoral rolls. The 16-day yatra, joined by INDIA bloc members like Tejashwi Yadav, aims to raise awareness and combat what they call "vote theft.

title: ‚ÄòI can‚Äôt take this stress‚Äô: BTech student found dead in hostel; note seeks fee refund
content: A 24-year-old Sharda University student, Shivam Dey, was found dead in his hostel room, having taken his own life due to academic stress. He left a note requesting a fee refund and absolving others of blame. This incident follows another student suicide at the same university last month, raising concerns about student well-being and support systems.

title: ‚ÄòGod is in the details‚Äô: Steve Jobs‚Äô rule for success; Isaacson recalls obsession
content: Steve Jobs, the Apple founder, was a firm believer in the philosophy that "God is in the details," shaping Apple's DNA through meticulous attention to even the smallest design elements. His relentless pursuit of perfection, extending to hidden components, pushed teams to innovate and create exceptional products.

title: Dewald Brevis: The AB de Villiers copycat, who has found his own wind
content: With a blistering century backed by a fiery fifty, 22-year-old Dewald Brevis has arrived on the international arena in style. Just like his childhood hero, AB de Villiers, Brevis can play the lap shot, scoop, switch hit, ramp, and reverse sweep. He is finally showing his class, and his coach Deon Botes, who also coached De Villiers and Faf du Plessis, shares how the child prodigy battled his dark phase and turned it around by going back to the basics.

title: Inside Alaska summit: Gifts, menus and missed ceasefire
content: A leaked document revealed quirky details of the planned Trump-Putin meeting in Alaska, including a bald eagle statue gift and pronunciation guides. While a filet mignon lunch was scrapped, the summit shifted focus from a ceasefire to a broader peace deal. Zelensky's upcoming White House visit will address Putin's proposal for Ukraine to cede territory in exchange for international peacekeepers.

title: Fast Lane Ahead! PM to inaugurate two Delhi-NCR NH projects- 10 things to know
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is set to inaugurate the Delhi section of the Dwarka Expressway and the Urban Extension Road-II, projects worth nearly Rs 11,000 crore. These initiatives aim to decongest Delhi, improve connectivity, and significantly reduce travel time between key locations like the Singhu border and IGI Airport, while also lowering pollution.

title: 'WhatsApp Screen Mirroring Fraud': How this scam happens; Simple tips to protect yourself from it
content: A sophisticated WhatsApp screen mirroring scam is targeting users, with fraudsters posing as bank employees to gain access to personal and financial data. They trick victims into sharing their screens, enabling them to steal passwords and OTPs. Experts advise verifying caller authenticity, enabling screen sharing only with trusted contacts, and avoiding financial apps during screen sharing to prevent falling victim.

title: Uncertainty over US-India trade deal as August talks put off
content: The Trump administration has introduced new uncertainty into the bilateral trade deal with India by postponing scheduled meetings, leaving Indian authorities awaiting clarity. A deadline looms for potential doubling of tariffs on Indian exports to the US. This situation is further complicated by existing tariffs and proposed secondary sanctions related to India's trade with Russia.

title: SC's interference in Prez-guv powers will destabilise power balance: Govt
content: The Centre has strongly criticized the Supreme Court's ruling on deadlines for presidential and gubernatorial assent to bills, arguing it unconstitutionally infringes on the powers of these high offices. The government contends that judicial review of assent procedures could destabilize the balance of power among the legislature, executive, and judiciary.

title: 'Moment of pride': Shubhanshu Shukla, India's 2nd astronaut, returns home
content: Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla, India's second astronaut, returned home after successfully completing Nasa's Axiom-4 mission, landing in India on Sunday. He was greeted by Union Minister Jitendra Singh and Delhi CM Rekha Gupta, along with his wife, Kamna Shukla. Shukla's mission, which included 18 days on the ISS, provides valuable experience for India's Gaganyaan program.

title: Watch: Back with a bang! Lamine Yamal's stunning goal leaves goalkeeper stunned
content: Lamine Yamal shone brightly as Barcelona kicked off their La Liga title defense with a resounding 3-0 victory over Mallorca. The young talent orchestrated the first goal and sealed the win with a stunning late strike. Mallorca's hopes were crushed  by two red cards, which involved a horror tackle on debutant Barca keeper Joan Garcia. Barcelona dominated, securing a commanding start to the season.

title: ‚ÄòSaam, daam, dand, bhed‚Äô: Sisodia video sparks row; BJP, SAD seek EC action
content: Opposition parties in Punjab are demanding action against AAP and Manish Sisodia after a video surfaced where he allegedly says the party will use any means necessary to win the 2027 election, including "saam, daam, dand, bhed."

title: 64-year-old retd Army officer on bicycle killed by SUV; incident caught on cam
content: A retired Army Captain, Narsa Ram Jajra, was fatally struck by a speeding SUV while cycling to his morning walk in Jaipur. The driver, identified as a woman, fled the scene after running him over near Gopi Kachori on Gandhi Path.

title: 'War 2' BO collection day 3: Hrithik-Jr NTR film crosses Rs 140 cr despite drop
content: ‚ÄòWar 2,‚Äô starring Hrithik Roshan, Jr. NTR, and Kiara Advani, clashed with Rajinikanth‚Äôs ‚ÄòCoolie‚Äô at the box office. The film opened strong but saw a drop on day 3, grossing Rs. 142.35 Cr in three days. Despite competition from ‚ÄòCoolie,‚Äô which currently leads with Rs. 158.25 Cr, ‚ÄòWar 2‚Äô is expected to surpass Rs. 150 cr.

title: 'Coolie' BO collection: Rajinikanth‚Äôs mass mania; film races past Rs 158 cr mark
content: Rajinikanth's 'Coolie', directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj, has become a box office sensation, earning ‚Çπ158.35 crore in India net within four days. The film had a historic opening day with ‚Çπ65 crore, led by Tamil Nadu and Telugu markets. Despite a slight dip on Friday, strong weekend momentum suggests 'Coolie' is on track to be a major hit in 2025.

title: 2 die, 95 injured during Mumbai dahi handi festivities
content: Mumbai's Gokulashtami celebrations, marked by dahi handi events, were marred by tragedy as a 39-year-old man and a 14-year-old boy died in separate incidents. At least 95 Govindas sustained injuries in the city, with the total number of injured across MMR reaching 123. Despite the unfortunate events, a troupe successfully formed a 10-tier pyramid thrice for the first time.

title: Hurricane Erin 2025 intensifies to category five storm: Which US states on alert; safety tips issued
content: Hurricane Erin 2025 rapidly intensified into a Category 5 storm, posing threats to the Caribbean and the US East Coast. While the storm's center is projected to remain offshore, dangerous surf, rip currents, and coastal flooding are expected from Florida to Maine. Residents are urged to stay informed, avoid coastal waters, and prepare for potential evacuation.

title: SBI, Union Bank up home loan rates for new borrowers
content: To safeguard their profitability, SBI and Union Bank of India are increasing home loan spreads despite falling policy rates. This reverses the trend of passing rate cuts to new borrowers, as banks grapple with sticky deposit costs. Public sector lenders, previously focused on market share, are now prioritizing sustainable returns, signaling a potential shift in the home loan market.

title: Some governors acting like mafia hitmen against citizens: Tushar Gandhi
content: Tushar Gandhi criticized governors, alleging some disrupt governance in opposition-ruled states and act as 'hitmen.' He accused communal forces of manipulating the educated upper class, fostering irrationality and persecution of minorities. The grandson of Mahatma Gandhi also condemned the National Education Policy 2020 for promoting a slave mentality and hiding realities, advocating for state-specific education models.

title: Taylor Swift electrifies Chiefs locker room before Week 3 vs Bears
content: The Kansas City Chiefs' locker room was in disbelief when Taylor Swift attended a game to support Travis Kelce, creating a surreal mix of NFL intensity and pop culture. Players like Chris Jones and Patrick Mahomes expressed their astonishment at Kelce's high-profile romance. This unexpected relationship has highlighted the human side of professional athletes and captivated fans worldwide.

title: Leafs fans on edge as Auston Matthews‚Äô health in doubt before opener
content: As the season opener approaches, the Toronto Maple Leafs are concerned about Auston Matthews' health. His readiness, compounded by Mitch Marner's absence, casts a shadow over the team's offensive capabilities. Matthews' form is crucial for Toronto's ambitions, as his performance directly impacts the team's rhythm and confidence. The Leafs may need to explore options if Matthews isn't at full strength.

title: Leanna Lenee: Jaguars rookie Travis Hunter slid into my DMs while dating
content: Jacksonville Jaguars' rookie Travis Hunter's recent marriage to Leanna Lenee is under scrutiny. Lenee once revealed that Hunter initially contacted her while he was in another relationship, which she rejected. Despite defending their relationship against accusations of ulterior motives, divorce rumors are now circulating, adding to the couple's challenges.

title: Don't contest nearly every AFT ruling, HC tells Centre
content: The Delhi High Court has criticized the Centre's frequent appeals against Armed Forces Tribunal (AFT) rulings that grant pension benefits to soldiers, urging the government to accept appropriate decisions gracefully.

title: NIA sleuths, cops arrest Andhra man, woman over 'links to Pak terror outfits'
content: NIA and Andhra Pradesh police apprehended Kothwal Noor Mohammed in Dharmavaram for alleged ties to Pakistan-based terror groups. He is accused of engaging in prohibited social media groups and communicating with suspected operatives across the border.

title: SFJ threatens CM Mann; Khalistani graffiti found on Punjab MLA's house
content: Sikhs for Justice (SFJ) has threatened Punjab CM Bhagwant Mann with "political death" starting August 31, the anniversary of Beant Singh's assassination. SFJ chief Gurpatwant Singh Pannun had previously threatened Mann and the Punjab DGP.

title: RG Kar case: President Murmu writes to victim‚Äôs parents
content: The parents of the R G Kar Medical College rape-murder victim have received an encouraging email from President Droupadi Murmu's office, offering support in their pursuit of justice. The President's assurance that her aide will assist them has instilled a renewed sense of hope in the family.

title: 'Conduct SIR after local body elections': Maharashtra poll panel urges EC
content: Maharashtra's State Election Commission has requested the Election Commission of India to postpone the special intensive revision of electoral rolls until after the upcoming local body elections. Citing staff shortages and pressure on election machinery due to ward formation and electoral roll bifurcation for the local polls, State Election Commissioner Dinesh Waghmare awaits a response from EC.

title: ‚ÄòFloods came like fire‚Äô: Pak‚Äôs monsoon misery overflows; toll crosses 350
content: Devastating flash floods and landslides in northern Pakistan have claimed over 350 lives, particularly in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa's Buner district. Triggered by heavy monsoon rains, the disaster swept away homes and infrastructure, evoking memories of the catastrophic 2022 floods. With warnings of further rainfall, rescue efforts are hampered by damaged roads.

title: J&K: Aircraft-shaped balloon with Pak airline logo found in Samba; probe on
content: A Pakistan International Airlines-branded, aircraft-shaped balloon was discovered in Ramgarh, Samba district, raising security concerns. Border Security Force troops are investigating the balloon's origin. Similar incidents involving balloons with Pakistani markings have occurred in the area previously, prompting heightened vigilance by security forces along the International Border and Line of Control.

title: Gracie Hunt transforms Kansas City Chiefs‚Äô preseason defeat into viral fashion spectacle
content: Gracie Hunt, daughter of the Kansas City Chiefs' owner, turned heads at a preseason game in Seattle with a striking all-black leather outfit, complete with a $7,000 Chanel bag. Her fashion choice overshadowed the team's loss and sparked online buzz, contrasting with her sister Ava's colorful, western-inspired look. Hunt's blend of NFL legacy and style influence continues to make waves.

title: Patrick Mahomes says he refused to believe when Travis Kelce spoke about dating Taylor Swift
content: Patrick Mahomes initially doubted Travis Kelce's relationship with Taylor Swift, needing to witness it to believe it. He acknowledged the increased buzz and attention Swift brought to the stadium. Mahomes also praised Swift's dedication to her new album, revealed on Kelce's podcast, as both athletes focus on their comeback after a Super Bowl loss.

title: 'Parties should have flagged roll errors before polls': EC on 'vote theft' row; presser today
content: Amidst allegations of electoral roll errors and "vote theft," the Election Commission has urged political parties to address concerns during designated periods. The EC refuted claims of collusion and manipulation, emphasizing the importance of timely scrutiny and correction of voter lists. Rahul Gandhi has launched a "Vote Adhikar Yatra" in Bihar, protesting alleged irregularities in the electoral roll revision.

title: Irfan recalls fiery rivalry with Afridi: 'I showed him who the real Pathan is - 11 times'
content: Irfan Pathan has revealed the personal edge to his rivalry with Shahid Afridi, stemming from Afridi's dismissive comments about Pathan's identity early in his career. Pathan admitted that Afridi's words fueled his determination to dismiss him, which he achieved 11 times across formats, including key moments like the 2007 T20 World Cup final.

title: ‚ÄòMountain came down‚Äô: Kishtwar survivors dig through rubble; search for loved ones
content: A devastating cloudburst in Jammu and Kashmir's Kishtwar district triggered flash floods, obliterating Chasoti village. At least 60 lives were lost, with scores injured and dozens still missing. Piyra Singh, a survivor, recounted the horror as his home collapsed, claiming the lives of his relatives. Rescue operations are underway as families grapple with immense grief.

title: Shannon Sharpe Lawsuit: Accuser posts ‚ÄúRescue me‚Äù message
content: Shannon Sharpe's legal battle with a former OnlyFans model seemingly concluded with a $23 million settlement, but the controversy lingers. The model's accusations, including threats and alleged sexual assault, led to Sharpe's ESPN departure and damaged reputation. Her recent social media post featuring Bible verses hints at her feelings about the outcome, while Sharpe remains silent on the matter.

title: New Record! Brevis surpasses Kohli, becomes the first-ever batter to ...
content: South Africa's Dewald Brevis eclipsed Virat Kohli's record for most T20I sixes against Australia in Australia, hitting 14 in three matches. Brevis scored a blistering 53 off 26 balls, including six sixes, but South Africa lost the series decider. Australia, wearing black armbands to honor Bob Simpson, initially struggled but ultimately secured victory.

title: When the streets become stages for artistes
content: Traditionally, therukoothu revolves around epics; contemporary narratives found place in such shows after Koothu-P-Pattarai, a modern theatre group, was founded by Na. Muthusamy

title: Heavy overnight rains cut off remote village in J&K‚Äôs Kathua
content: The district administration is closely watching the situation and have requested people to stay away from water bodies for their safety, the officials said

title: Shubhanshu Shukla returns to India; likely to meet PM Modi
content: Mr. Shukla was part of the Axiom-4 private space mission that lifted off from Florida on June 25 and docked at the International Space Station on June 26; he returned to Earth on 15 July

title: AP Chambers welcomes two-slab GST system, says it reduces compliance burden
content: The new tax system provides big relief to the MSMEs, enabling them to recover and grow, says Chambers president Potluri Bhaskara Rao

title: Gouthu Latchanna‚Äôs struggles for the oppressed classes truly inspiring, says Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu
content: The veteran freedom fighter and social reformer symbolises the spirit of struggle, efficiency and courage, he says in a post on X

title: Heavy rain likely in North Coastal A.P. until August 19 as fresh low pressure brewing over Bay of Bengal
content: IMD has issued orange alert for Visakhapatnam, Vizianagaram, Kakinada, Anakapalli, Alluri Sitharama Raju districts on August 17

title: Drowning has claimed 7,798 lives in Odisha since 2020
content: Experts believe most of these deaths are preventable underscoring urgent need for a public health intervention

title: Family of nurse found dead in Bengal‚Äôs Singur demands CBI probe
content: The family members of the nurse had refused the post mortem of the nurse‚Äôs body at a government run facility on Friday. On Saturday the post mortem was conducted at All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Kalyani

title: Kathua boy finds voice after eight years of silence, thanks to Army doctor
content: Born with a cleft lip and palate, Akshay underwent a surgery but was still unable to speak; Captain Salunkhe trained the boy personally in speech therapy

title: Congress releases list of 71 district presidents in M.P.; OBC leaders given maximum representation
content: Senior party leader Digvijaya Singh's MLA son and former State Minister Jaivardhan Singh has been made Guna district president

title: What are the challenges confronting the EC? | Explained
content: Why is the Election Commission of India in the eye of a storm? What are the allegations raised by the Opposition? What happened after the draft electoral roll was released in Bihar? What is the Supreme Court‚Äôs interim order? How are migrant voters going to be affected by the SIR?

title: West Bengal teacher who lost job after SC verdict dies of ‚Äòstress-induced‚Äô stroke
content: Mr. Soren had been a prominent figure at the forefront of the agitations and had been present in multiple instances when police clashed with protesting teachers.

title: How document deficits may risk disenfranchising the poor, eroding trust in the Election Commission
content: Economic location is a major factor in terms of document possession; gap extends to entire families ‚Äî only about one in every 10 poor households said every adult member had a birth certificate

title: Set up parallel bridges on a war footing: islanders
content: All-party delegation coordinated by FRAG to meet the Chief Minister with a request for setting up parallel bridges to the first and third Goshree bridges

title: DMK is not the AIADMK to be afraid of Enforcement Directorate raids, says CM
content: Speaking at the CPI State conference, Stalin said the Union government was threatening leaders¬†of Opposition parties; DMK alliance will win in 2026 Assembly poll, defeating all such plots, he said

title: Shwetha Menon | Madam president
content: The actor has been elected the first woman president of the Association of Malayalam Movie Artistes, which was rocked by the revelations of the Hema Committee last year

title: Farmers to lay siege to Vidhana Soudha in Bengaluru on August 20
content: A ‚Äòsatyagraha‚Äô will be held at Freedom Park in Bengaluru, says H. Bhagyaraj, president of the Karnataka State Sugarcane Growers‚Äô Association

title: U.S. team may defer August 25 India visit for trade pact talks: Official
content: The U.S. is pressing for greater market access in politically sensitive areas such as agri and dairy sectors, which India cannot accept as it affects the livelihood of small and marginal farmers

title: Defeated candidate wins after SC recounts votes in sarpanch election
content: The recount, done by a Registrar of the Supreme Court under video surveillance in the Supreme Court, turned the election result on its head. Mohit Kumar, who had been declared as defeated in the previous result, won by a good margin in the election to a Haryana gram panchayat

title: Karnataka Kolhapuri Chappal makers seek PRADA‚Äôs support
content: ‚ÄòMost of the production of Kolhapuri chappals happens in Karnataka, while most of the sale happens in Maharashtra. They are named after the city they are sold in, not made in‚Äô

title: NCERT module blames Congress for Partition; party says Hindu Mahasabha first suggested the idea
content: Congress, Jinnah and Lord Mountbatten were responsible for Partition, says module meant for Classes 6 to 8; Congress calls it distortion of history

title: Centre should not have asked President to issue Reference, says Kerala
content: Kerala agreed with T.N.‚Äôs stand that the April 8 judgment on prescribing timelines for the President and Governors had comprehensively dealt with every single question of law raised in the Presidential Reference

title: Manipur Governor Ajay Kumar Bhalla to hold additional charge of Nagaland
content: Mr. Bhalla has been given the additional charge in the wake of the demise of Nagaland Governor La. Ganesan on August 15

title: LSE Graduate Among 3 Arrested Over Cyber Extortion Bid From Thailand
content: A post-graduate from the London School of Economics and two others have been arrested in a cyber extortion case in Delhi. The three men allegedly tried to extort money from a businessman through a WhatsApp call from Thailand.

title: Delhi Man Rapes 65-Year-Old Mother Twice As 'Punishment', Arrested: Police
content: A 39-year-old man has been arrested for raping his 65-year-old mother twice, claiming he was punishing her for a relationship she had in the past.

title: Trump Seeks To Hold Trilateral Meet With Putin, Zelensky On August 22: Report
content: US President Donald Trump has told European leaders that he wants to arrange a trilateral summit with Putin and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky as soon as August 22.

title: Parliament To Hold Special Session On Shubhanshu Shukla's Space Mission
content: As the Indian Air Force (IAF) Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla was given a grand welcome as he arrived in New Delhi, the Lok Sabha will hold a special discussion on India's space journey and Shukla's historic mission aboard the ISS.

title: "Best Way To End Horrific Russia-Ukraine War Is...": Trump After Putin Meet
content: Donald Trump on Saturday dropped his push for a ceasefire in Ukraine in favor of pursuing a full peace accord -- a major shift announced hours after his summit with Russian leader Vladimir Putin yielded no clear breakthrough.

title: Asim Munir Rules Out Replacing Asif Ali Zardari As Next Pakistan President: Report
content: Pakistan Army chief Asim Munir has ruled out any change in the leadership, describing rumours about the removal of President Asif Ali Zardari as completely false.

title: "Been Planning For A Year": Sharda University Student Dies By Suicide
content: A 24-year-old B. Tech (Computer Science) student of Sharda University, situated in Greater Noida, allegedly died by suicide in his hostel room on the campus, police said on Saturday.

title: Trump Backs Putin's Plan To Take Full Control Of Ukraine Land: Report
content: Trump on Saturday spoke to Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky and European leaders about his talks Friday with Russian President Vladimir Putin.

title: PM Modi To Inaugurate Key Rs 11,000 Crore Highway Projects In Delhi Today
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is set to inaugurate two major National Highway projects in the national capital today, that will help in easing congestion on the roads and also add to smooth and better connectivity in Delhi-NCR region.

title: Homecoming: Astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla, 2nd Indian In Space, Lands In Delhi
content: Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla, the second Indian to go to space and the first to visit the International Space Station, has set foot in his homeland again.

title: Alaska Meet Highlights: After Putin Meeting, Ukraine's Zelensky To Meet Trump In Washington On Monday
content: Trump-Putin Alaska Meet Highlights:¬†Donald Trump and his Russian counterpart, Vladimir Putin, did not reach a deal to end Russia's war in Ukraine after talks in¬†Alaska.

title: Putin Wins Ukraine Concessions In Alaska But Did Not Get All He Wanted
content: In a few short hours in Alaska, Vladimir Putin managed to convince Donald Trump that a Ukraine ceasefire was not the way to go, stave off US sanctions, and spectacularly shatter years of Western attempts to isolate the Russian president.

title: 'Maybe It Will End': Russians Welcome Putin-Trump Summit
content: Russian pensioner Lyudmila said she was glued to the coverage of Vladimir Putin's trip to Alaska on Friday for talks with Donald Trump on Ukraine.

title: Gangster Salman Tyagi Found Dead In Delhi Jail, Suicide Suspected: Cops
content: A notorious gangster with several criminal cases registered against him, including those for murder and extortion, was found dead in his cell at Mandoli Jail here on Saturday, officials said.

title: Man Jailed During Emergency Refuses Honour, Gives Minister Memo For Justice
content: An uneasy silence fell over the Independence Day celebrations in Madhya Pradesh's Damoh on Friday after an 84-year-old man who was imprisoned during the Emergency refused an honour and handed an application to the minister instead.

title: 'US Thinks They Can Boss Around': Top Economist Jeffrey Sachs Slams Trump Tariffs On India
content: US economist Jeffrey Sachs has criticised President Donald Trump for slapping hefty tariffs on India, denouncing the policy as both "stupid" and saying it "serves no purpose".

title: US Trade Team's India Visit Called Off, Likely To Be Rescheduled: Sources
content: Amid a strain in economic ties because of the increased tariff, a planned visit by a US team to India for trade negotiations from August 25 to 29 has been cancelled and is likely to be rescheduled, sources have told NDTV Profit.

title: Drug Destruction Up 132%, Seizures Up 104% In Tripura: Chief minister
content: Tripura Chief Minister Prof. Dr Manik Saha on Friday said police and security agencies have been directed to take strict action against those involved in drug smuggling.

title: Fire At Russian Industrial Plant Kills 11, Injures 130
content: A fire at an industrial plant in Russia's Ryazan region on Friday killed 11 people and injured 130, Russian officials said Saturday.

title: After Ruckus At 'Bengal Files' Trailer Launch, Cops Say Vivek Agnihotri Didn't Take Permission
content: Kolkata Police sources have told NDTV that filmmaker Vivek Agnihotri had not sought any administrative permission for public view of the trailer of The Bengal Files in Kolkata.

title: Jharkhand lifts night shift ban for women
content: The entire responsibility of the safety and security of women employees will be of the concerned company and its management; the consent of the women employees who will be made to work in night shift is also mandatory

title: Govt. sanctions ‚Çπ54 crore for VETRI Palligal to prepare students for JEE, NEET
content: According to a government order, VETRI Palligal in every block would help Class 11 and 12 students get into premier higher education institutions

title: Bengaluru fire accident: Narrow lanes made rescue operations a Herculean task
content: As the fire broke out at the unit containing plastic and packing material, the fire spread rapidly, covering the entire building

title: Rashtrapati Bhavan responds to SOS email by parents of R.G. Kar victim
content: Email response directs the victim‚Äôs parents to liaise with the President‚Äôs aide; they had reached out to Rashtrapati Bhavan thrice since their daughter‚Äôs death, but to no avail

title: Neelam Social releases documentary on conservancy workers‚Äô protests
content: Founded by filmmaker Pa. Ranjith, Neelam Cultural Centre‚Äôs YouTube channel especially focusses on social and political issues faced by the marginalised sections of the in society

title: Major irregularities in 2024 Maharashtra Assembly polls, claims Vote for Democracy report
content: A constituency-level study of the election alleges unexplained voter surges, data mismatches, and procedural lapses; the report warns of ‚Äòweaponisation‚Äô of India‚Äôs election system and calls for urgent reforms

title: An anonymous life without an¬†Aadhaar¬†identity
content: A number of people from tribal communities across Maharashtra face barriers to accessing education, health care, and government schemes because they are not registered with the Unique Identification Authority of India, finds¬†Purnima Sah

title: No foreign voters in Bihar SIR list; Modi brings divisive agenda: CPI(ML)
content: Countering PM Narendra Modi‚Äôs statement on Independence Day that illegal immigration is threatening the country‚Äôs demography, CPI(ML) general secretary Dipankar Bhattacharya says the SIR exercise in Bihar did not bring out a single case of illegal immigrants in the State

title: Monthly premium for Phase 2 of Medisep enhanced to ‚Çπ750
content: Government issues order approving Phase 2 of Medisep which offers an enhanced basic coverage of ‚Çπ5 lakh. The scheme has been revamped as per the recommendations of an expert committee

title: Utmost transparency in preparing electoral rolls: Election Commission of India
content: In a statement, the Commission says some political parties did not examine the electoral rolls at the appropriate time and did not point out errors

title: No foreign nationals in Bihar SIR: CPI (ML) Liberation questions PM's 'infiltrator' remark
content: CPI(ML) leader criticises Modi‚Äôs anti-immigrant agenda, challenges claims of illegal immigrants in Bihar SIR, ahead of opposition‚Äôs Vote Adhikar Yatra

title: Only legally valid cases should be admitted in AC courts, says Karnataka Revenue Minister¬†
content: Revenue Minister Krishna Byre Gowda on Saturday warned Assistant Commissioners against admitting cases beyond their legal jurisdiction

title: Catholic priest‚Äôs presence at RSS event in Pala raises eyebrows
content: Father George Nellikunnu Cherivu Purayidom‚Äôs participation at the event comes in the wake of recent attacks on nuns and priests from Kerala in Chhattisgarh and Odisha, allegedly by Sangh Parivar activists.

title: Janmashtami celebrated with fervour in Hubballi-Dharwad
content: Devotees prepared 108 delicacies that were offered to the Lord. A 155-kg laddu, prepared from pure desi ghee by Bhairu Caterers Hubballi, became the highlight among the offerings

title: Midweek mayhem: hybrid work clogs Hyderabad‚Äôs IT corridor
content: Tuesdays to Thursdays have turned into gridlocks, with traffic up by 25% on key roads connecting Hyderabad‚Äôs IT corridor with residential hubs

title: Kochi Corporation accused of awarding contract to fill potholes despite procuring patching machine
content: Limit set for pothole-patching machine exceeded in three to four months after it was used for resurfacing entire stretches, says Mayor

title: ‚ÄòDharmasthala chalo‚Äô rally reaches temple town from Nelamangala
content: The rally has been taken out to oppose ‚Äòsmear campaign‚Äô and ‚Äòslander‚Äô against Dharmasthala Manjunatha temple and its administration in the backdrop of the ongoing SIT investigation into the alleged burial of bodies in Dharmasthala village more than a decade ago

title: Fantasy baseball news: Duran carted off, Muncy sidelined with oblique strain
content: the fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . the remaining 14 games were played under the lights, with four more matinees following, with the final 10 games being evening affairs . for the second straight day, action gets underway at 2:20 p.m. ET .

title: ‚õ≥ Augusta National ditches masses for revenue
content: the 2026 "Official Masters Hospitality" program includes offers of housing, transportation, catering and so on to the corporate and/or well-heeled . the "Full Scale, Private Home Program," which will run you a mere $219,600 for the week, comes days after the announcement that a local Hooters restaurant is closing .

title: ‚öæ MLB awards: Sanchez, Skenes for NL Cy Young?
content: this month's awards watch reflects changes atop some races and separation in others . the two methods of tracking these things are in complete accord when it comes to anointing the current favorites . a lot can and will change in short period of time in a big league baseball season .

title: What NFL scouts make of Arch Manning, what Texas can expect from him
content: arch Manning will get his chance to be the face of the longhorns this season . he won't get the chance to ease into the starting role as top-ranked Texas will play at defending national champion and no. 3-ranked Ohio State in its season opener on august 30 .

title: NFL preseason Week 2 takeaways: Giants rookie QB Jaxson Dart continues red-hot summer
content: the Packers beat the Colts 23-19 in a preseason win . the first-round pick finished 14-of-16 for 137 yards with a TD passing and another rushing . this came on the heels of an impressive debut against the Bills .

title: The NBA schedule is out! Best games -- and beefs -- to watch
content: the regular season begins Oct. 21 with reigning NBA champion Kevin Durant 's new team, the Houston Rockets . leBron James , Luka Doncic and the Los Angeles Lakers host Stephen Curry and the Golden State Warriors . plenty of stars will don new jerseys setting up must-see reunions and playoff rematches as the season approaches .

title: Emotion-filled Liverpool summon inner strength for dramatic win
content: Antoine Semenyo scores twice in the second half to cancel out goals from Hugo Ekitike and Cody Gakpo . a minute's silence was observed in memory of Diogo Jota and his brother Andr√© Silva . anfield paid an emotional tribute to the portuguese forward .

title: From 'KGB' to Central Michigan: What we learned, and didn't learn, from the Michigan report
content: Connor Stalions referred to his advanced sign-stealing operation as both "counterintelligence" and "the KGB" the former Michigan staffer called the video it elicited "dirty film" and ultimately threw his phone in a pond . the punishments for that operation arrived on Friday .
